eventDecorators.name: BondIncreased
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: ExitRateChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NewPIC
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: changeExitRate
functionDecorators.description: allows the current PIC for the given token to change the exit rate.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The Super Token the exit rate should be changed for.

parameterDecorators.name: newExitRate
parameterDecorators.description: The new exit rate. The same constraints as during bidding apply. Notes: newExitRate can't be higher than the value returned by getMaxExitRateFor() for the given token and bond. newExitRate can also be 0, this triggers closing of the flow from the contract to the PIC. If newExitRate is > 0 and no flow exists, a flow is created.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentPIC
functionDecorators.description: get the address of the current PIC for the given token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The token for which to get the PIC.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentPICInfo
functionDecorators.description: get info about the state - most importantly the bond amount - of the current PIC for the given token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The token for which to get PIC info Notes: The bond changes dynamically and can both grow or shrink between 2 blocks. Even the PIC itself could change anytime, this being a continuous auction.

returnDecorators.name: pic
returnDecorators.description: Address of the current PIC. Returns the ZERO address if not set.

returnDecorators.name: bond
returnDecorators.description: The current bond amount. Can shrink or grow over time, depending on exitRate and rewards accrued.

returnDecorators.name: exitRate
returnDecorators.description: The current flowrate of given tokens from the contract to the PIC.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFundsInCustody
functionDecorators.description: allows previous PICs to withdraw bonds which couldn't be sent back to them.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The token for which to withdraw funds in custody.
